title: You know, I don't even exclusively play Riven.
body:
But I just love how GD claims she is extremely easy.

Comparing Riven to other top laners (Ryze, Trynd, Liss, Lulu, J4, Renekton) and to good players, it is extremely difficult to do well with Riven. 

You have to know your power spikes and snowball, otherwise you get shit on for 40 minutes.
